about_the_game:
America, 19th century after the Civil War. Sand dunes, hot sun, and galloping horses - feel it all while holding a portion of Tequila on ice in your hand. In Saloon Simulator Prologue, take on the challenge of rebuilding an old saloon in the heart of the Wild West and become a pioneer in the liquor business.

Prepare drinks, serve them to customers, and discover their stories

Not everything went your way; you were cheated, but don't worry! Your longed-for paradise is closer than ever - refresh the ruined interior and repair the damaged furnishings. Purchase the most necessary equipment, stock up on alcohol, and start designing the saloon to your liking. Just remember, money is not manna from heaven - ill-considered purchases are not necessarily advisable here!

Prepare dishes, feed your guests, and observe their reactions

In Saloon Simulator Prologue, you are the owner of a ruined Saloon. Make the wooden walls once again become a place of bustling meetings with a lot of alcohol. Attract customers and fulfill their expectations with the utmost care, while learning about drink recipes or various types of alcohol inspired by 19th-century America. But that's not all, your task will also be to provide an atmospheric decor, and thus maintain order.

Enhance your saloon by choosing from over 50 decoration models.

Earn reputation points and attract more and more customers. Make your new guests want to come back again and again with generous tips. Create the most recognizable business in the Wild West.

Build relationships with 8 unique NPCs and become a part of their lives.

Serving drinks or preparing food is a hard and time-consuming job, but it becomes impossible without prior preparation of the logistical background. Plan your orders in advance and keep your saloon stocked. Increase your business capital through negotiations.

Maintain your saloon for customer comfort

Expand your Saloon - unlock new equipment or rooms. Establish new relationships with characters and reap the benefits of them, all to help your business thrive.

Dive into the mechanics of the criminal world

The 19th-century West beyond the sand dunes and hot sun offers history-soaked grounds and a variety of activities. As the day begins to head west, while holding a glass of cold Tequila, take a look at what the area outside the Saloon has to offer, as well as its residents, whose favor will make your life easier more than once or twice.

 

Saloon Simulator Prologue, includes:

-16 Quests: Engage in a variety of tasks that introduce you to saloon management.

-12 Drinks and Recipes: Mix and serve a selection of 10 drinks and 2 special recipes.

-8 NPCs: Interact with unique characters, each with their own stories and challenges.

-Bartending Mechanics: Master drink preparation and cooking.

-Criminal World Mechanics: Experience thrilling activities like dismantling carts and hiding bodies.

-Full Customization: Customize every aspect of your saloon from the floor to the chandelier.

-Premises Management: Unload goods, clean up, and maintain a pristine environment.

-Bar Fights: Handle conflicts and keep the peace in your saloon.

-3 Merchants: Trade with various suppliers for essential goods and decorations.

-Over 50 Customizable Objects: Personalize your saloon with a wide range of items.

-Dealing with Death: Navigate the darker aspects of saloon management, including handling dead bodies.

Get ready to dive into the life of a saloon owner and create the most recognizable business in the Wild West with Saloon Simulator Prologue.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 10100f / Ryzen 3400G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 4GB / AMD Radeon RX 460 4GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400f / Ryzen 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB

short_description: Saloon Simulator Prologue lets you restore an abandoned Saloon and discover that managing it isn't just about creating drinks and meals. Clean up, organize, and choose the right friends - all to become the most recognizable business in the Wild West!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Polish
